game.name: Throne and Liberty
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound
game.shortDescription: 쓰론 앤 리버티는 고전적인 MMORPG의 본질을 포착하면서 매 턴마다 새로운 게임 요소, 깊이, 흥미를 선보입니다. 길드를 모아 전투를 준비하고 왕좌와… 자유를 향해 출발하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Throne and Liberty captures the essence of classic MMORPGs while introducing new gameplay elements, depth and excitement at every turn. Gather your guild, prepare for battle, and set forth for throne... and liberty!

reviewHighlights.text: Riddled with cheaters and bug abusers who get no punishment meanwhile players using new equipment get flagged as cheater cause the devs dont even know...
The devs and people who created this game have no clue how to run it. they continue to allow cheaters to get away with everything while punishing the...
